snippet.title: Playtesting a top secret video game | Chris & Jack
snippet.description:
PLAY THE ACTUAL GAME! Let us know your high score :)
Desktop Version: https://chrisandjacksketch.itch.io/save-the-watermelon
Mobile Version: https://chrisandjacksketch.itch.io/save-the-watermelon-mobile

Watch our most popular sketches! https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLSpZLcBI3iW8UuwB6O3FwEYh6XxfvC1By&si=SEhfz3BDucMkV17J&playnext=1

Itch.io Game Creation: Nick Thomas
Game Visual Design: Brendan Rice

Get one month free of Skillshare!
https://skl.sh/chrisandjack01242

The world's best video gamer goes to a mysterious facility to test out a new video game in development called "Save the Watermelon". But it soon becomes clear that the game is a mask for something much bigger. Twist after twist as the layers go deeper and deeper until finally... well, we honestly have no idea what's going on in this thing.

As seen at:
Fantasia International Film Festival, Seattle International Film Festival, The Actors Awards, The Los Angeles Comedy Festival, Telluride Horror Show, Ridgway Independent Film Festival, The Fantasy Film Festival, Art Blocks International Film Festival, Hollywood Shortsfest, the Los Angeles Film Awards, and Buffer Festival.

We're Chris W. Smith and Jack De Sena (aka Chris & Jack). We've been friends for years and love making high-quality, high-concept sketch comedy. Chris was a Blue Man in Blue Man Group. Jack voiced Sokka in Avatar the Last Airbender. In 2016 we united to create this channel, confusingly titled “Chris & Jack”, which has served as a shared platform to write, produce, direct, edit, and star in our own stuff. We're releasing comedic sketches of all shapes and sizes the first and third Friday of every month. Sci-Fi, Heists, animation, movie tropes, absurdist bits, and plenty of fun new experiments. But above all else, friendship.

If you'd like to help us make future shorts and sketches, please support our Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/chrisandjack 

Check out all our stuff: https://chrisandjack.komi.io/
-Merchandise: https://www.pixelempire.com/collections/chris-and-jack
-Our podcast: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjHQDpOQYcsbahkI2yAmxjw
-Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chrisandjacksketch
     (Chris) https://www.instagram.com/chrissmithwho
     (Jack) https://www.instagram.com/jackdesena
-Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chrisandjackarechrisandjack
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ChrisAndJack/
Discord: https://discord.gg/sBVGdmg

CAST:

Agent 17 - Jack De Sena
Gamer & Evil Bee - Chris W. Smith

CREW:

Written/ Directed/ Produced by - Chris & Jack
Edited by  - Chris W. Smith
Director of Photography  - Michael Rizzi      
Gaffer - Dilip Isaac
1st AC - Andy Chen
Key Grip - Jesse Martinez
Sound - James Hull
VFX - Lane Carter
Thumbnail design by - Matthew Ramirez
Chris & Jack main theme song by - Jeff Toyne
Music and SFX: http://share.epidemicsound.com/chrisandjack (sign up for a 30day free trial!)
Special thanks: Michael Stamp

#chrisandjack #sketchcomedy #videogames
